names.pinyin: qing re jie du xi ji
names.english: clear heat and reduce toxin wash (topical)
names.commonEnglish: Clear Heat and Reduce Toxin Wash

actions: Clears Heat, dries Dampness, disperses Wind, kills parasites and stops itching.
Dries Dampness, kills parasites and stops itching topically.
With Ku Shen and Bai Bu, for itchy, weeping skin lesions.
With Ming Fan, as an external wash for chronic vaginal discharge with itching and eczema.
With Ku Shen, as an External wash for lice.
Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxicity, cools the Blood Clears Damp-Heat and treats sores.

notes: Decoct then steam and wash for 20 to 30 minutes, three times daily. The inflammation is generally resolved in 3 to 7 days.
